text: The River Wild is a 1994 American adventure movie directed by Curtis Hanson and starring Meryl Streep, John C. Reilly, Kevin Bacon, David Strathairn, Joseph Mazzello, Benjamin Bratt. It was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1994 movies Category:1994 adventure movies Category:American adventure movies Category:Movies directed by Curtis Hanson Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Idaho
title: The River Wild
